title: Introducing: Crystal Sister
body:
LA has a developed a habit recently of producing ethereal, dreamy pop, and Sonya Bender aka **Crystal Sister** is just the latest in a long line of emerging California based artists.

With her two debut tracks, _Take My Hand_ and _Suicide Love,_ she showcases a pop edge that seemingly draws from the likes of Gwen Stefani, in being super slick, whilst focusing on massive choruses, especially on Take My Hand. Check out both below.
